ttl.name: VEHICLE STABILITY CONTROL SYSTEM(w/ Pre-collision System)

para.dtcname: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Circuit Voltage Below Threshold
Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Circuit Voltage Out of Range
Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Signal Stuck In Range
Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Internal Electronic Failure
Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Component Internal Failure

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Circuit Voltage Below Threshold

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure is below -0.744 MPa (-7.6 kgf/cm2, -107 psi) for 5 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Circuit Voltage Out of Range

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) or more, braking is performed (stop light switch assembly is ON) and master cylinder pressure differential value is below 20 MPa/s, difference between master cylinder pressure estimated from vehicle deceleration and master cylinder pressure sensor input value is large for 1 second or more 5 times or more for 9 trips.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Circuit Intermittent

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: When vehicle speed is 10 km/h (6 mph) or more, noise in master cylinder pressure value occurs 7 times or more in 5 seconds.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Signal Invalid

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor invalid condition continues for 0.2 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Signal Stuck In Range

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Any of the following is detected:

item.ptxt: When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) or more and master cylinder pressure exceeds 1.764 MPa (18.0 kgf/cm2, 255 psi), master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more continuously for 60 seconds.

When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) and master cylinder pressure is 2.45 MPa (25.0 kgf/ cm2, 355 psi) or more, master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more continuously for 30 seconds.
Master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more 5 times or more while vehicle speed decreases from 40 km/h (25 mph) to 0 km/h (0 mph).

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" No Signal

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor communication invalid condition continues for 0.1 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Internal Electronic Failure

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Any of the following is detected:

item.ptxt: When voltage at terminal +BS is 9.5 V or higher, power supply voltage of master cylinder pressure sensor is continuously low for 1 second or more.

When master cylinder pressure sensor power supply voltage has risen, master cylinder pressure sensor has overheated or overcurrent of master cylinder pressure sensor continues for 1.2 seconds or more.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

data-name.name: detect-item
data-name.ptxt: Brake Pressure Sensor "A" Component Internal Failure

data-name.name: dtc-detect-cond
data-name.ptxt: Either of the following is detected:

item.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure exceeds 23.328 MPa (237.8 kgf/cm2, 3382 psi) continuously for 0.1 seconds.
Master cylinder temperature exceeds 150°C (302°F) continuously for 0.1 seconds.

data-name.name: trouble-area
data-name.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure sensor (Brake actuator assembly)

entry.ptxt: When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) or more and master cylinder pressure exceeds 1.764 MPa (18.0 kgf/cm2, 255 psi), master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more continuously

When vehicle speed is 7 km/h (4.3 mph) and master cylinder pressure is 2.45 MPa (25.0 kgf/ cm2, 355 psi) or more, master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more continuously
Master cylinder pressure does not increase 0.048 MPa (0.5 kgf/cm2, 6.9 psi) or more 5 times or more while vehicle speed decreases from 40 km/h (25 mph) to 0 km/h (0 mph)

atten4.ptxt: DTC will be output when conditions for either of the patterns in the table above are met.

entry.ptxt: When voltage at terminal +BS is 9.5 V or higher, power supply voltage of master cylinder pressure sensor is continuously
Master cylinder pressure sensor power source voltage is high
Master cylinder pressure sensor is overheating
Overcurrent in master cylinder pressure sensor

atten4.ptxt: DTC will be output when conditions for either of the patterns in the table above are met.

entry.ptxt: Master cylinder pressure exceeds 23.328 MPa (237.8 kgf/cm2, 3382 psi) continuously

atten4.ptxt: DTC will be output when conditions for either of the patterns in the table above are met.

atten3.ptxt: After replacing the skid control ECU (brake actuator assembly), perform "Calibration".

test1.ptxt: Replace the master cylinder pressure sensor (brake actuator assembly).
